hero.name: Auren Moyo
hero.title: Data Science & Artificial Intelligence Engineer
hero.description: Specialized in advanced modeling, machine learning and deep learning. Passionate about AI innovation and automation of decision-making processes.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Data Science Engineer passionate about AI
about.description1: Trained at EPITA in an engineering cycle specialized in Data Science and Software Engineering, I am currently consolidating my journey with a research project in finance and artificial intelligence at Devoteam.
about.description2: Passionate about AI, data analysis and visualization, as well as automation, I have developed solid skills in Python, SQL, Power BI, machine learning, deep learning and MLOps.
about.description3: Rigorous, results-oriented and able to work both independently and in a team, I will be delighted to take on new challenges and actively contribute to innovative projects.

fraudDetection.title: Fraud Detection by FHE
fraudDetection.description: Development of an innovative banking fraud detection system using Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) to preserve data confidentiality. Client-server architecture with client-side encryption and server-side predictions without decryption.

dataEngineering.title: Data Engineering - Blue EnerFreeze
dataEngineering.description: Implementation of a data cleaning robot for photovoltaic power plants, development of ML models for energy production forecasting, and design of a hybrid ETL for gas consumption data extraction via GRDF API.

financialAI.title: Financial AI - Devoteam
financialAI.description: Design and implementation of advanced methods (Reinforcement Learning, Deep Learning, LLM) applied to finance. Development of a multi-asset market simulation environment with crisis scenarios and volatility regimes.

scraping.title: Scraping & API Integration
scraping.description: Implementation of data scraping with Selenium and integration of ChatGPT's GPT-3.5-turbo API to introduce innovative features in a commercial application. Development of a secure API with complete documentation.

devoteam.title: Junior Consultant in Artificial Intelligence & Digital Transformation
devoteam.description: Design and implementation of advanced methods in finance: Reinforcement Learning, Deep Learning, LLM. Multimodal data engineering and development of market simulation environments.

blueEnerFreeze.title: Data Engineer
blueEnerFreeze.description: Development of data cleaning robots for photovoltaic power plants, ML models for energy forecasting, and design of hybrid ETLs for gas consumption data via GRDF API.

immar.title: Intern
immar.description: First 4-month professional internship, introduction to industrial projects and development of skills in applied software engineering.

epita.title: Engineering degree in computer development
epita.description: Specialization in Data Science and Software Engineering. Complete training in AI, machine learning, software development and technical project management.

prepa.title: Scientific preparatory class
prepa.description: Mathematics and Physics option. Intensive training in fundamental sciences preparing for engineering studies.

devoteam.title: Devoteam AI Level 2 - Sales
devoteam.skills: understanding of AI use cases, AI offer positioning, client-oriented consulting approach, commercial argumentation around AI solutions.

udemyDataScience.title: Data Science and Machine Learning MasterClass Python

aws.title: AWS Cloud Foundations
aws.skills: cloud computing basics, AWS architecture principles

git.title: Professional Git & GitHub/GitLab/Azure DevOps
git.skills: advanced Git mastery, branch management, pull/merge requests, collaborative workflows, conflict resolution and repository management on GitHub/GitLab/Azure DevOps.

streamlit.title: Deploy ML Models with Streamlit
streamlit.skills: creating interactive applications with Streamlit, ML model integration, session/caching management, connection to data sources and secure production deployment.

tensorflow.title: Deep Learning with TensorFlow 2 & Keras
tensorflow.skills: developing deep learning models (ANN, CNN, RNN, GAN), advanced use of TensorFlow 2 & Keras, data analysis and preprocessing with NumPy/Pandas, and model deployment in production.
